description: The Sierra Shorts stretch and move with you through the crux and dry quick after the post send swim. Featuring a heavy denier for added durability for those who like to push their threads to the limit. A branded elastic waistband and Velcro back pocket combined with two front hand pockets make these shorts comfy and perfect for adventures on and off the rock.
